attributes.action: treat those on esa with equality and stop discriminating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many people on the new esa scheme will be getting less money to those on the old equivelent this is discrimination and most certainly does not promote equality. The first 13 weeks and waiting days will force many into severe poverty. if you think this kind of discrimination on the governments behalf is unfair/illegal sign here. thank you
